text: Elizabeth Harrower (8 February 1928encyclopedia – 7 July 2020) was an Australian novelist and short story writer. She was known as "one of the great novelists of Sydney". She was born in Sydney. Her best known works were Down in the City, The Watch Tower and In Certain Circles. Harrower died on 7 July 2020 in Sydney, aged 92.Harrower, Elizabeth (1928–2020) ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian novelists Category:Writers from Sydney
title: Elizabeth Harrower (writer)
